name.description: The name of the configuration, for use within k2 configurations.

kind.description: The type of configuration this object it.

provider.description: The name of the provider for this provider setting.

resourcePrefix.description: Any prefix that should be prepended to resources in AWS to make them easier to identify.

vpc.description: CIDR for the VPC for the cluster.

region.description: Region to create resources in (us-east-1, us-west-2, etc.).

subnet.description: List of subnets to use within a region for the cluster.

egressAcl.description: List of egress ACLs to create for the VPC.

ingressAcl.description: List of ingress ACLs to create for the VPC.

ingressSecurity.description: List of ingress security rules to create for the VPC.

egressSecurity.description: List of egress security rules to create for the VPC.
